attributes.action: Enable every citizen to park outside their own houses.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If it's the middle of the night and you come home looking for a parking space outside your house. And there is another car in your space you have to park up the road, If you have sleeping  kids in the car it is very anoying if you have to carry them all the way down the road. We think you should have your own bay for only you to park in when ever you want & guests should park at the over end of the road after all they don't live there.
